body.raw:
## Objective The goal was not only create a good user experience for informational website, but to structure the whole ecosystem including payments, memberships, custom admin dashboards etc. ## About Client
Ace Battle Association is a special running events organizer. Despite the fact, that companyâ€™s main product is offline events, their need in high quality software is essential.
## Challenge Ace Battle Association was very specific client, since it is a new organization, without any previous IT projects implemented. Throughout a year working for this companies we changed multiple projects and still updating existed. ## Functionality ### Memberships The task were to build a user friendly membership based user roles. The roles are: > - Visitor (Base role) > - Runner > - Coach > - Manager Each role has different access to different pages. There are a connectivity between roles ### Notification System
Of course the app suggests at least basic notification system. Users get notifications from different users, system. They may also get notification to their phones. > Expo gives opportunity to easily build and test notification System. While socket io make sure everything being updated when using the app.
